main.introSubHeader: Look no more. I am a web design & development specialist.
main.name: Satvik Gadag
main.description: I passionately collobrate innovations. With every line of code, I strive to make the web a beautiful place
main.bio: I'm a Full Stack Web Developer specializing in web application development with 3+ years of hands on experience in JavaScript, ReactJS, NodeJS, Native / Hybrid mobile application development using Android / Flutter. I love understanding people’s problems and finding ways to solve them by designing versatile solutions & Write well abstracted, reusable, highly performant code.
main.contactmessage: Wanna hire me? Get in touch with me here!

education.description: Bachelor degree in Computer Science from Visweswarya Technological University - Belagavi
Completed 12th with PCMS stream from Karnataka State Pre - University Board
Completed schooling from Centeral Board of Secondary Education

work.title: Senior Software Engineer
work.description: A Senior Web Developer with expertise in JavaScript ES6/ES7, ReactJs, Redux, Webpack 4, HTML5 & CSS. Also with secondary skills Node.js, Webpack, Java, J2EE

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Worked as a full stack developer with primary skills being JavaScript, Android, Node.js & ReactJs. Designing & Developing Web based application as well as Building effecient REST API server using Node.js

projects.title: Re-Active Notes
projects.category: A Simple Notes app Designed using Material Design Concepts

projects.title: Shopping Cart
projects.category: (offline now) An E-Commerce model platform developed using React

projects.title: XPERIA™ Z WALKMAN & MEDIA APPS
projects.category: Ported Sony Media Applications from 2013 series Sony Xperia Android devices to all 2011 series Sony Xperia Android™ certified devices

projects.title: CM12STEREOSOUND
projects.category: A MOD which enables earpiece to be used as Loud Speaker and convert Mono Audio to stereo in Sony Xperia Z | ZL | ZR model mobiles.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
